response_text: Here are top AI-powered video translation tools great for agencies to scale multilingual content quickly and efficiently:Colossyan+1 [https://www.colossyan.com/posts/5-best-video-translator-software-options-for-global-content-reach]  üîù Best Overall for Agencies  HeyGen ‚Äì Instant translation into 175+ languages with AI voice output and lip sync suited for social and marketing videos.HeyGen+1 [https://www.heygen.com/translate]  Rask AI ‚Äì Enterprise-friendly localization with 130+ languages, multi-speaker detection, and voice cloning (API available for workflow automation).Rask [https://www.rask.ai/]  Smartcat ‚Äì Translate into 280+ languages, with integrated subtitling + AI dubbing and brand voice consistency.Smartcat [https://www.smartcat.com/video-translation/]  Maestra ‚Äì Full pipeline: auto transcription, subtitles, AI voiceovers, and voice cloning in 125+ languages.Maestra AI [https://maestra.ai/]  üìå Great for Fast Turnaround & Content Speed  Vozo.ai ‚Äì AI voice cloning + lip sync + editable subtitles for 110+ languages.Vozo [https://www.vozo.ai/video-translate]  ScreenPal AI Translator ‚Äì Quick subtitles + voiceovers in 140+ languages; easy web-based tool.ScreenPal [https://screenpal.com/tool/ai-video-translator]  Kapwing ‚Äì Simple interface for quick subtitle translation + basic dubbing inside an all-in-one editor.Synthesia [https://www.synthesia.io/post/best-video-translator-apps]  üìå Alternatives Worth Considering  VEED.io ‚Äì Video editing + automatic translation/subtitles workflow.All Voice Lab [https://allvoicelab.com/blog/top-10-ai-video-translator-tools-in-2025-subtitle-removal-ai-dubbing-and-voice-cloning]  ElevenLabs (AI dubbing features) ‚Äì Excellent voice quality for dubbed content (audio-centric but pairs well with video tools).ElevenLabs [https://elevenlabs.io/dubbing-studio]  How to choose for agency use:  High-volume localization: Smartcat or Maestra.  Fast social content: HeyGen, Vozo, Kapwing.  API integration & automation: Rask AI.  Voice quality: ElevenLabs + pairing with subtitle tools.Colossyan [https://www.colossyan.com/posts/5-best-video-translator-software-options-for-global-content-reach]  If you want recommendations by use case (e.g., conferences vs ads vs training videos), tell me your main content types.
